title: Clash Over Ukraine Drives a Dagger Into Globalization
sub_head: To Putin, who never shared the Westâ€™s belief in global economic integration, the EU is a threat just like NATO
body:
It began as a trade dispute over chocolates.
In 2013 Ukrainian president Viktor Yanukovych was on the verge of signing an association agreement with the European Union, a big step toward integrating with the global economy.
